Please try again later.</404> An error occured during LiberKey login.

Please check your proxy configuration.</403> You have provided a wrong password.

Please provide the correct password. An error occured during the download.
Try again? The user was not found in the LiberKey database.

%path%

Messages.DownloadingTip: Downloading updates...\nClick here for more details.
Messages.DownloadDone: Your updates have downloaded successfully.\nThe LiberKey menu will close while your applications are updated.
Messages.ConfirmCancel: You are downloading updates.\nDo you wish to cancel the download and update?
Messages.HttpError: An error occured while trying to recover information about available LiberKey updates.\nDo you have access to internet on this computer?
Messages.UpToDate: Your LiberKey applications are up to date.
Messages.UpdatesAvailable: Updates are available for your applications.\nClick here to install updates.
Messages.LowPriorityInfo: This update is recommended if you regularly use this software.\nIt can bring new features.
Messages.HighPriorityInfo: We encourage you to apply this update.\nIt contains several important fixes, some of which may affect the application's security.
Messages.HideUpdateInfo: Disabled updates can be displayed again by clicking "Show hidden updates"
Messages.AppAlreadyInstalled: %appname% %appversion% is already installed on your LiberKey.\n\nDo you want to re-install this application ?
Messages.AppUpdateObsolete:
A newer version of %appname% is already installed on your LiberKey.

Version already installed: %appversion%
Version being installed: %newversion%

Do you want to install the old version?
Messages.TempSpaceNeeded: The available space to download temporary installation files is too low.\n\nYour selection requires %downloadsize% of free space on drive %drive% (there are currently only %avail% available on %drive%)
Messages.AppsDownloadDone:
Download in the file repository is completed.
=> %downloadpath%

Do you want to start installing the updates now?
Messages.KeepTempFiles: Do you want to keep the downloaded files for later usage?
